TEXT.TITLE: JOE FRANKLIN AND ASSETS DEVELOPMENT TO MERGE
TEXT.BODY: Privately-held Joe Franklin Productions Inc said it entered into a preliminary agreement to merge with Assets Development Corp, a public company. Terms were not disclosed. The companies said they expected the merged group to qualify for listing on NASDAQ. Reuter
